hibernate-mapping.query: FROM com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.ExamSubject examSubject WHERE examSubject.exam.description = ? AND examSubject.subject.description = ?
FROM com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.ExamSubject examSubject WHERE examSubject.exam.examId = ? AND examSubject.subject.subjectId = ?
SELECT examSubject.examSubjectId FROM com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.ExamSubject examSubject WHERE examSubject.exam.examId = ?
SELECT COUNT(examSubject.examSubjectId) AS count FROM com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.ExamSubject examSubject WHERE examSubject.exam.examId = ?
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT exam_subject_id FROM EXAM_SUBJECT WHERE exam_id = ? AND exam_subject_id NOT IN ( SELECT es.exam_subject_id from EXAM_MARKS em RIGHT JOIN EXAM_SUBJECT es ON es.exam_subject_id = em.exam_subject_id INNER JOIN EXAM exam ON exam.exam_id = es.exam_id WHERE es.exam_id = ? and year = ?)
hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT examSubjectId FROM com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.ExamSubject examSubject WHERE examSubject.exam.examId = ?
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select Count(em.exam_subject_id) from EXAM_SUBJECT es join EXAM_MARKS em on em.exam_subject_id = es.exam_subject_id where em.exam_subject_id = ? and (em.marks != null || em.grading_id != null || em.is_Optional != 1)
